headline: ADP Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend
summary: The board of directors of Automatic Data Processing, Inc. (Nasdaq: ADP) has declared a regular quarterly dividend of $1.54 per share payable April 1, 2025 to shareholders of record on March 14, 2025.

raw.headline: ADP Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend
raw.summary: The board of directors of Automatic Data Processing, Inc. (Nasdaq: ADP) has declared a regular quarterly dividend of $1.54 per share payable April 1, 2025 to shareholders of record on March 14, 2025.

headline: ADP price target raised to $290 from $285 at TD Cowen
summary: TD Cowen analyst Bryan Bergin raised the firm’s price target on ADP (ADP) to $290 from $285 and keeps a Hold rating on the shares as part of a Q4 preview for the human capital management space. Recent share outperformance across most of the sector and some instances of consensus estimates being at risk “yield a fairly high bar for this earnings season, leading us to favor the cleanest setups,” the analyst tells investors in a research note.
